Name: Retailer Tycoon
About the game: Retailer Tycoon is a base building game that incorporates all types of retailer shops from general stores to wholesale stores. The aim of this game is to become the biggest and most wealthy retailer store chain possible thatâ€™s based across Sydney Australia. In Retailer Tycoon you are able to begin your store (any type of store) from limited funds (based on the game mode) and grow your store, enter new and exciting locations, upgrade how your store is run, managing staff, open your store late for community events and so much more to explore.
